description: Generates responses that deliberately challenge conventional wisdom or mainstream perspectives. This decorator encourages critical thinking by presenting counterarguments, alternative interpretations, or challenging established positions on a topic.

parameters.name: approach
parameters.description: The specific contrarian approach to take

parameters.name: maintain
parameters.description: Whether to maintain contrarian stance throughout (true) or provide balanced view at the end (false)

parameters.name: focus
parameters.description: Optional specific aspect of the topic to focus contrarian analysis on

examples.description: Basic devil's advocate approach with balanced conclusion
examples.usage:
+++Contrarian
Why is renewable energy considered the future of power generation?
examples.result: Challenges conventional thinking about renewable energy's dominance, presenting counterarguments and limitations, followed by a balanced perspective

examples.description: Maintained skeptical contrarian stance focused on a specific aspect
examples.usage:
+++Contrarian(approach=skeptic, maintain=true, focus=methodology)
Discuss the reliability of climate models in predicting future global temperatures.
examples.result: Provides a consistently skeptical analysis of climate model methodologies, questioning assumptions, limitations, and historical accuracy throughout the response
